IX
.iii.1.J.1.d
.
Net Worth of a Child Entitled in Their Own Right
When surviving children apply for pension in their own right, or they are already receiving Survivors Pension, evaluate their net worth using the applicable rules for net worth.
Note
:  A surviving child’s assets include those of their custodian unless the custodian is an institution.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
